import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Create a new shortcut"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/users/shortcut/new"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Creates a new rule-based shortcut linking a filter set and rule configuration for quick access to filtered entity views.

**Prerequisites**
1. **RuleId** - Use the Rules API to create or retrieve a rule configuration.
2. **ForEntityTypeId** - Entity type UUID (Ticket, Asset, User, etc.).
3. **FilterSetId** (optional) - Use [GET /api/v1.0/filtersets](#/Filters/listFilterSets) to retrieve filter set IDs.

**Workflow Example**
1. Create or select a rule: obtain RuleId from Rules API.
2. Determine entity type: use ForEntityTypeId for the target entity (e.g., Ticket entity type).
3. POST to this endpoint with shortcut configuration.
4. Extract `Item.ShortcutId` from response for future reference.

**Minimal Required Fields**: Name, Scope, RuleId, ForEntityTypeId

**Notes**: Scope determines visibility: User (personal), Role (shared with role members), Team (team members), Site (site-wide), Global (all sites). OwnerId should match the user, role, or team ID based on Scope.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"User shortcut/quick action configuration. Mirrors `Spark.Shared.Models.Shortcut`.","properties":{"ShortcutId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Unique identifier for the shortcut."},"OwnerId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"UUID of the user, role, or team that owns this shortcut (depends on Scope)."},"Name":{"type":"string","description":"Display name for the shortcut."},"Scope":{"type":"string","description":"Visibility scope for the shortcut.","enum":["All","System","Global","Site","App","User","Role","Team"]},"RuleId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"UUID of the rule that defines this shortcut's behavior."},"ForEntityTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"UUID of the entity type this shortcut applies to (e.g., Ticket, Asset, User)."},"Snippet":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Code snippet or configuration for the shortcut action."},"FilterSetId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Optional UUID of an associated filter set."}},"title":"Shortcut"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
